content: a simple beanie pattern featuring the mistake rib stitch with a folded 1x1 rib brim this pattern is available in one size which will fit most average adult heads you can size up or down by adjusting the number of stitches in increments of 16 the gauge listed was measured with the hat comfortably stretched as it would be stretched while worn if you do a simple brim rather than a folded one you should be able to get away with using a single skein of yarn
